definition: Tengwang Tower in Nanchang, Jiangxi/one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓|岳阳楼[Yue4 yang2 Lou2] in Yueyang, north Hunan, and Yellow Crane Tower 黃鶴樓|黄鹤楼[Huang2 he4 Lou2] in Wuhan, Hubei

sentences.english: The existing Tengwang Pavilion was rebuilt by Nanchang People's Government in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 现有的滕王阁乃南昌人民政府于1989年重建而成。

sentences.english: Once more, this article to "Teng Wangge Foreword" the teaching factual record carries on the review.
sentences.chinese: 再次，本文对《滕王阁序》的教学实录进行点评。

definition: Yueyang Tower, famous beauty spot in Yueyang, north Hunan, overlooking Dongting Lake 洞庭湖[Dong4 ting2 Hu2]/one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yellow Crane Tower 黃鶴樓|黄鹤楼[Huang2 he4 Lou2] in Wuhan, Hubei and Tengwang Tower 滕王閣|滕王阁[Teng2 wang2 Ge2] in Nanchang, Jiangxi
Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]
